title: World War 2 - Again
cleaned_text:
What is happening now is in fact a continuation of World War 2 only we can see the commies have become a lot more sneaky. Nowadays, they are not doing "Invasion". That is the old way of conducting war and it no longer is effective. These days the way they fight wars is to get inside a country and take it over from inside. Infiltration. This might start to make sense why everything is so Evil inside your country, from evil politicians to celebrities, etc. and what they are really about.

more than two. There are several more, and they are playing with us.

Now the evil on this world has not rested one bit since they lost WW2. The reason they lost WW2 is that our planet had help. They were supposed to win and turn this whole world into a Communist World, but with help from outside this world, they. As we know, the first thing that happened is that the Nazis from back then simply came over to America and starting working there in secret labratories and secret underground bases. Nazism actually expanded and became a kind of Satanic Nazism, and it has become more and more open about itself ever since. There is no country where it doesn't lead us, doesn't influence us and it absolutely rules Capitalism, it rules the stock markets, it rules large companies and it is very, very dark. It is why everything in the world is wrong. And why they go around deliberately ruining the environment. That is no mistake; they know exactly what they do.Now because the Galactic Federation has become extremely active on the planet, they have massively picked up their Dark plans and, no not to invade us, but to take us down from INSIDE. This is why we have Covid-19, what amounts to a cold with a 99.98% survival rate, and why we are told by Governments worldwide that we must take this vaccine. The vax has not been tested on humans (not publicly anyway). There are all sorts of real medicines that get rid of Covid but they are suppressed; they are blocked. You must get jabbed and then they will be happy. Only even that doesn't make them happy. There is in fact, in Israel, a third jab that is now necessary and rumoured a forth jab and a fifth jab. It is funny because you are promised freedom if you only get jabbed (and we have no idea what is IN the jab) but then that promised freedom is then removed because there are more jabs to take. More lockdowns to have. When does it stop? That's right - never. Look at Israel.What we are learning is that this will go on forever or until we die. It is rumoured that the jab is actually lethal for a human, but it takes several years (3-5) to work. Why, when there are more simple ways to get over Covid-19, like hydroxy-chloriquine and other cures that have been around for 60 years and work, must we take a jab that is untested on us. If it is untested, then we do not know what it will do. The goal-posts keep changing and we keep being told we must take more jabs. Here in Australia we are told we must take 2 jabs....but we know from what is occurring in Israel that it isAnd from what we see in Israel, where they are, they have all these jabbed people in hospital suffering with Covid. If you think you will get a jab and avoid it, statistically you are more likely to be sick once you get the jab. This is TRUTH. Hmm.The only real choice we have is to stand up to these evil government officials and say no. And in actuality, it will be easy. There is maybe 30% of people here in Australia who do not want the jab - since it is rumoured to be deadly. When it becomes time for the satanic commies to jab the last 30% of us, what will they do? They can do nothing. They will try to force or mandate the jab and will be met with opposition. Since all the underground DUMBs have been blown up over years, and all the off-world people have been removed, it is only humans who are left at this stage. BE EXCITED. The off-world mob have been defeated and removed, even the spiders - thank God. It is now human against human; or I should say a peace-loving human against a hybrid-reptilian human who are extremely few in number. Who do you put your money on? We got over 7 Billion humans, and they have a couple of hybrids? Yes, it is as you see, we will walk all over them.I can see no other option than people will begin to wake up and we will rebel, BIG TIME. Yes, the humans on this world have been taught to stay at home and fear. Go and cover yourself. But sooner or later, and I think sooner, we are going to rise up. This planet will not be taken. There is so much going on behind the scenes. It is not how the fake news is presenting it, no not even a little bit.Once the humans rise up to overthrow all of these elected politicians and their fake rules for us to follow, it is on. All it takes is for us to say, "enough is enough". You keep promising to hand us back our freedoms, but you will not do it, ever. And when people begin to see it, begin to wake up big time, you are all in a world of trouble. All you Satanic Commies. And I have to laugh because here in Australia, the helicopters who hovered over my house, did circles over my house for TWO YEARS, thrice a week for two years....where are they now? A month and not a copter in sight. It's already began. (whispers) It is on.Yes, you've lost WW2 - again!! Hahaha!!!! And all the trouble you took to infiltrate this time. You took all the trouble to come inside our countries for decades, secretly doing your child sacrifices and other satanic things, and then you troubled to look like you were one of us. Well it hasn't worked. No, not even a little. Where have all the helicopter pilots gone I wonder? They have all been taken up into orbital prison, that's where. And they will never in their wildest dreams ever get out of it. It is so funny I have to laugh. I told them that would happen. They thought they would actually win....oh the joviality!It's not long now people. To the reptilian-human hybrids, to those who are even left...and it isn't many....get ready to go down. And pretty soon the medicine that fixes vaccinations (yes, there is one) will go out. There are many, many people in place, and many, many plans that are to happen for the Good. Won't that be nice? And all these misguided humans will be saved from the vax. Because that is what the Galactic Federation of Worlds does....it cares, it will leave us in peace, and it will even fix all those who got the jab. Hooray for the Galactic Federation! Hip Hip Hooray!!! :)Let me update this article to say that Joe Biden has just announced (11/9/2021) that Vaccines are exempt for Congress and their aides, and also for Court Workers. That is correct. While the whole world must quickly get vaccinated, not so Congress. Well, after all they must keep their puppets well while the rest of us get sick. Plus he mandated that all companies with over 100 employees get vaccinated. How obvious is this? No vaccines for them, but for us it is mandated? It's completely insane. Read between the lines people. It's obvious.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UzZQZP9s82w&ab_channel=WorldNewsReportToday
